Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life at the beginning of the century (part I) and his period of terminal illness in 1933 (part II). Writer-director Hagiwara Kenji divides the movie into two separate parts, with numerous movie and animation pieces.
